notes: Replace 'testnet' with your desired network (mainnet, testnet, betanet, etc.)
For EVM tokens, ensure ChainId matches your target network (8453 for Base mainnet)
Set manager, reserve, freeze, and clawback addresses as needed for ASA tokens
For ARC3 tokens, ensure image URLs are accessible and provide valid integrity hashes
Adjust total supply and decimals based on your token economics
For production, use proper IPFS URLs and content integrity hashes
